Workflow.Name: SetupWizard>UpdateDataflowEnvironment
Workflow.Description: This flow is triggered from the Setup Wizard, and updates environment variables with the unique IDs of the dataflows that are part of the core components solution.
Workflow.BillingContext: [{"id":"admin_CoESetupWizardPreview","type":"UnifiedApp","metadata":{"displayName":"CoE Setup and Upgrade Wizard"}},{"id":"admin_SetupWIzardARMFeatures","type":"UnifiedApp","metadata":{"displayName":"Setup WIzard - ARM Features"}}]

Description.description: This flow is triggered from the Setup Wizard, and updates environment variables with the unique IDs of the dataflows that are part of the core components solution.
